channel.title: Boombox on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in Boombox on purpleidea.com

item.title: USB Audio on a Boombox
item.description: In an earlier post, I got USB audio working on my used, manual, 2013 Honda Civic EX. Today I’ll do the same for a Sony ZS-RS60BT boombox. Here it is in all its used glory after a little cleaning. Background: I decided I should get a small portable boombox to practice my dope dance moves. I currently still suck because I think I spend more time computering than out on the floor.
